DOCNAME: AZIM DENIZCILIK TICARET VE SANAYI LIMITED SIRKETI v. UKRAINE
JUDGES: Ganna Yudkivska;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP company with its office in FAC , GPE . It was represented before the ORG by Mr Y. Efe , a lawyer practising in PERSON . The respondent Government were represented by PERSON Y. GPE , their Agent . ORG had exercised its right to intervene ( LAW CARDINAL § CARDINAL ( b ) of ORG ) .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

At the material time the applicant company owned a ship , M / V Sevgin . On DATE it was hired to carry goods of ORG V. from ORG , a NORP port , to PERSON , a NORP port . For this purpose on DATE the applicant 's ship arrived at ORG port . According to the applicant , the ship was damaged when mooring . After the cargo had been loaded on the ship , the independent inspectors revealed that the cargo had been damaged because of water leaking through a hole in the ship .

On DATE the ORG company instituted proceedings in ORG ( the “ Town Court ” ) against the applicant , seeking compensation for the damaged cargo . On DATE , at ORG 's request , the court impounded the applicant 's ship to secure the claim .
In DATE ORG adjourned the hearings on CARDINAL occasions due to the parties ' failure to appear before it .

On DATE ORG allowed ORG 's claim and awarded it CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) in damages and ORG CARDINAL in costs and expenses . On DATE ORG adopted a decision specifying that the judgment of DATE could be enforced by way of selling the impounded ship . According to the applicant company , it was only notified about the proceedings at this stage .
On DATE ORG instituted enforcement proceedings and on DATE attached the applicant company 's ship .

On DATE the ORG , ruling on the applicant company 's appeal , upheld the judgment of DATE but quashed the decision of CARDINAL DATE , which had been adopted in the absence of the parties . The matter was remitted back to ORG but it is not clear from the available documents whether any decision has been taken on it .
On DATE , at the end of the DATE time - limit for lodging of appeals against the court decisions mentioned in the preceding paragraph , the applicant company appealed in cassation .

On DATE ORG of Odessa quashed the bailiffs ' decisions of DATE , finding that the enforcement proceedings in the applicant company 's case should have been carried out by the NORP authorities in accordance with the relevant treaty between GPE and GPE . It further ordered that the applicant company should not be prevented by anybody from using its ship . However , on DATE , when the crew attempted to board the ship , the bailiffs ' officers barred them access .
On DATE , at the applicant company 's request , the ORG of GPE prohibited the public sale of the applicant 's ship . On DATE the ORG dismissed an appeal by the bailiffs against this decision .
On DATE ORG , for the purposes of partial enforcement of the judgment of DATE , acknowledged ORG 's property right over the disputed ship . On DATE this decision was enforced .
On DATE ORG informed the applicant that criminal proceedings had been instituted against the bailiffs ' officials for abuse of powers .
On DATE ORG allowed in part the applicant company 's appeal in cassation and quashed the judgments of DATE and DATE as unfounded remitting the case to ORG for a fresh examination .
On DATE ORG took over the case .
DATE and CARDINAL DATE QUANTITY hearings were adjourned because of , inter alia , the applicant company 's relevant requests .

On the last - mentioned date the applicant company counterclaimed , seeking damages from ORG for the loss of its ship . It also requested to adjourn the hearing . For this reason , on CARDINAL DATE ORG , having allowed the request , adjourned the hearing till DATE .
On DATE the hearing was adjourned till DATE due to the applicant company 's failure to attend it as its representative was ill .
On DATE ORG awarded PERSON damages in the amount of ORG ORG and rejected the applicant company 's counterclaim as unsubstantiated .
On DATE the applicant company appealed .
On DATE the ORG upheld the judgment .

On DATE , at the end of the DATE time - limit for lodging of appeals against the above court decisions , the applicant company appealed in cassation . It did not mention in its cassation appeal that it had not had sufficient time to prepare for the hearings of the case .
On DATE ORG , acting as a court of cassation , dismissed the appeal and upheld the lower courts ' decisions .
